description.narrative: The Customs Modernization Project aims to finance (i) the migration and upgrading of the customs automated data processing system (GAMAS); (ii) the improvement of infrastructure at major customs houses and customs border posts; and (iii) institutional strengthening, including business process reengineering, capacity building in relation to the above two components, interagency coordination, regional cooperation, and public-private partnerships.
